    \index{src \textit{(package)}!src.parser \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module src.parser}

    \label{src:parser}
\begin{alltt}
Parse user-defined calendars and return proper .ics file. 
\end{alltt}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{src:parser:get_events}
    \index{src \textit{(package)}!src.parser \textit{(module)}!src.parser.get\_events \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_events}(\textit{infile})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}
Parse input file to get info about events. 
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{src:parser:convert_to_calendar}
    \index{src \textit{(package)}!src.parser \textit{(module)}!src.parser.convert\_to\_calendar \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{convert\_to\_calendar}(\textit{events})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}
For each event , parse it and convert to vcard, then convert the whole to a calendar .ics. 
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
